APP_DETAILS_DEPRECATED_ALERT_SUBTITLE: A breaking change in this app prevents it from being updated automatically. You can still use this version and update it manually, but it is recommended to switch to a newer version and migrate your data. You can find an updated version in the app store under the same name.

APP_INSTALL_FORM_ERROR_PORT: Port must be a number between 1024 and 65535

APP_INSTALL_FORM_PORT_HINT: Port on which the app will be accessible
APP_INSTALL_FORM_ENABLE_AUTH_HINT: Protect this app with your Runtipi login. This does not work with IP addresses, you will need to use either the local domain or the expose feature.
APP_INSTALL_FORM_FORCE_PULL_WARNING: This app uses the {{tag}} tag, this means that the image will be pulled every time you start it and you may get rate-limited by the registry.
USER_CONFIG_WARNING_DESCRIPTION: By editing the user config, you may break the app. Make sure you know what you are doing. If your app fails to start after editing the user config, look for the logs in the browser console or in the runtipi settings page.

SETTINGS_GENERAL_ALLOW_ERROR_MONITORING_: Error monitoring is used to track errors and improve Runtipi. Keep this option enabled to help us improve Runtipi.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_APPS_REPO_HINT: アプリリポジトリの URL です。
SETTINGS_GENERAL_DOWNLOAD_CERTIFICATE: 証明書をダウンロード

SETTINGS_GENERAL_INTERNAL_IP_HINT: This IP address is used to configure installed apps.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_LOCAL_DOMAIN_HINT: ローカルネットワーク内のアプリにアクセスするために使用されるドメイン名。あなたのアプリはapp-name.local-domainからアクセスできます。
SETTINGS_GENERAL_SETTINGS_UPDATED_RESTAR: Settings updated. Restart your instance to apply new settings.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_APP_DATA_PATH_HINT: The location in which app data are storred.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_PERSIST_TRAEFIK_CONFIG_: Persist the Traefik configuration folder throughout restarts. This will allow you to customize the Traefik configuration.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_DOMAIN_HINT: Expose your dashboard to a custom domain. Make sure you have A records pointing to the server's IP address.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_LISTEN_IP_HINT: The IP address on which the dashboard listens on.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_PORT_HINT: The port on which the dashboard listens on.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_SSL_PORT_HINT: The port on which the dashboard listens on with SSL.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_EVENTS_TIMEOUT_HINT: The time in minutes after which the events are considered stale.
SETTINGS_GENERAL_ADVANCED_SETTINGS_SUBTI: Advanced settings used only if you know what you are doing.
